name: MICTLAN (El Kazue)
description:
MICTLAN is an Action Game, where you take control of #7, a man with the power of Telekinesis, he can attract and repel objects on the enviroment.  

He was extorted by the people who gave him his powers to steal something in a nightclub called: "MIctlan" at the "Ciudad de México"...

Get the Five Dossier who carry's "Activated Neon" a Sustance who can bring the fiction to the Reality. 

I hope you like the game i'm stilling working on it, to add the story into the game.
